import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Navbar() { const [click, setClick] = useState(false); const handleClick = () => setClick(!click); const closeMobileMenu = () => setClick(false); const menuIcon = ( ); const timesIcon = ( ); return (
NSA
{click ? timesIcon : menuIcon}
  • Home
  • Resources
  • Scholarship
  • Blogs
); } export default Navbar;
